医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生酮饮食可提高胰腺癌治疗效果一项针对禁食和生酮饮食的研究揭示了胰腺肿瘤对现有抗癌药物的新脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Ketogenic-diet-can-boost-efficacy-of-pancreatic-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Ketogenic-diet-can-boost-efficacy-of-pancreatic-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c44a4aad-1167-4b56-8568-e059a23149fe Wed, 14 Aug 2024 13:32:58 -0400 Ketogenic diet can boost efficacy of pancreatic cancer therapy
澳大利亚研究表明镁含量低会增加慢性病的风险澳大利亚的一项新研究确定了为什么富含镁的饮食对我们的健康如此重要，可以降低 DNA 损伤和慢性退行性疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Australian-research-links-low-magnesium-levels-to-increased-risk-of-chronic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Australian-research-links-low-magnesium-levels-to-increased-risk-of-chronic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6883a4d-d942-42ae-9d07-25ff13c5757f Wed, 14 Aug 2024 13:20:45 -0400 Australian research links low magnesium levels to increased risk of chronic diseases
气动计算机可以成为一种更可靠、更具成本效益的方式来帮助预防血栓和中风当某些医疗设备出现故障时，新型气动计算机会发出警报。该发明是一种更可靠、成本更低的方法，有助于预防血栓和中风——；全部没有电子传感器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Air-powered-computers-can-be-a-more-reliable-cost-efficient-way-to-help-prevent-blood-clots-and-笔画.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Air-powered-computers-can-be-a-more-reliable-cost-efficient-way-to-help-prevent-blood-clots-and-笔划.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7c56c8a-9ff2-48e9-8fb8-6f4c010b8387 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 12:51:51 -0400 Air-powered computers can be a more reliable, cost-effective way to help prevent blood clots and strokes
芬兰研究表明秋季和冬季出生与哮喘和过敏性鼻炎发病率较高有关一项新的基于登记的研究显示，在芬兰，秋季或冬季出生与哮喘和过敏性鼻炎有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Finnish-study-links-autumn-and-winter-births-to-higher-rates-of-asthma-and-allergic-rhinitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Finnish-study-links-autumn-and-winter-births-to-higher-rates-of-asthma-and-allergic-rhinitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=beeab5cd-66f2-4242-8957-6ab3056d9d74 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 12:34:57 -0400 Finnish study links autumn and winter births to higher rates of asthma and allergic rhinitis
肝脏硬度成为治疗后丙型肝炎风险评估的关键指标现代药物几乎可以治愈所有丙型肝炎。然而，如果在治愈时已经出现晚期肝损伤，则仍然存在肝癌和门脉高压并发症的残余风险，例如腹水、消化道出血和精神错乱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Liver-stiffness-becomes-crucial-indicator-for-post-treatment-hepatitis-C-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Liver-stiffness-becomes-crucial-indicator-for-post-treatment-hepatitis-C-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c9a8bfd-12f4-4052-b90a-435b1439058c Wed, 14 Aug 2024 12:29:26 -0400 Liver stiffness becomes crucial indicator for post-treatment hepatitis C risk assessment
研究揭示染色质结构如何影响狗的社会行为一项针对狗的新研究发现，染色质的空间结构在社会行为的进化中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-how-chromatin-struct-influences-social-behavior-in-dogs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-how-chromatin-struct-influences-social-behavior-in-dogs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0c72ab5-d312-4ff2-85ae-f4f1ed595961 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 11:18:59 -0400 Study reveals how chromatin structure influences social behavior in dogs
工作压力和努力回报失衡与房颤风险较高有关根据今天发表在开放获取、同行评审期刊《美国心脏协会杂志》上的新研究，工作压力造成的工作相关压力以及付出的努力与获得的回报之间的不平衡可能会增加患心房颤动的风险美国心脏协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Job-strain-and-effort-reward-imbalance-linked-to-higher-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Job-strain-and-effort-reward-imbalance-linked-to-higher-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e2579b-8c73-431a-8fb6-cfbaffb70bb9 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 11:11:10 -0400 Job strain and effort-reward imbalance linked to higher risk of atrial fibrillation
超级碗枪击事件中幸存的孩子们感到害怕，遭受惊恐发作和睡眠问题2 月份的堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗游行中，加布里埃拉·马格斯-达格 (Gabriella Magers-Darger) 的双腿被弹跳子弹的火花烧伤，六个月后，这位 14 岁的女孩已经准备好把过去抛在脑后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Kids-who-survived-Super-Bowl-shooting-are-scared-suffering-panic-attacks-and-sleep-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Kids-who-survived-Super-Bowl-shooting-are-scared-suffering-panic-attacks-and-sleep-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d607ba7-cf84-4863-8178-47b76196960e Wed, 14 Aug 2024 07:54:50 -0400 Kids who survived Super Bowl shooting are scared, suffering panic attacks and sleep problems
DeNovix 发布新的 CellDrop 模型和应用DeNovix 宣布推出新型 CellDrop FLi 自动细胞计数仪，这是广受欢迎的 CellDrop 系列的最新更新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/DeNovix-releases-new-CellDrop-model-and-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/DeNovix-releases-new-CellDrop-model-and-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=023ac7d4-c6a2-4b82-9faf-954399b7cda7 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 07:18:00 -0400 DeNovix releases new CellDrop model and applications
研究发现在常规实验室测试中没有临床上有用的长期新冠病毒生物标志物目前使用的测试是否足以识别 SARS-CoV-2 (PASC) 的急性后遗症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-finds-no-clinically-useful-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-in-routine-lab-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-finds-no-clinically-useful-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-in-routine-lab-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d5a1d06-f92e-4f36-bf0f-416992f6e7da Wed, 14 Aug 2024 05:47:00 -0400 Study finds no clinically useful biomarkers for long COVID in routine lab tests
